message.content:
cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.ED, cs.IR

Reasoning: 
- cs.CL (Computation and Language) is the most likely category as the paper deals with language learning and text difficulty evaluation.
- cs.LG (Machine Learning) is also likely as the paper uses experimental classification results to evaluate the effectiveness of grammatical templates in improving text difficulty prediction accuracy.
- cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) is another possible category as the paper proposes a new approach to evaluating text difficulty using grammatical templates.
- cs.ED (Education) is a possible category as the paper's focus is on language learners and improving their engagement with texts.
- cs.IR (Information Retrieval) is a less likely category, but still possible as the paper deals with text analysis and classification.
